description: 2007United Nations-approved, African Union peacekeeping mission for assisting Somali government forces in providing security for a stable political process, enabling the gradual handing over of security responsibilities from AMISOM to the Somali security forces, and reducing the threat posed by Al-Shabaab and other armed opposition groups members: Sudan, Eritrea, Uganda, Djibouti, Burundi, Nigeria, Ghana, Malawi
